EmailTemplate.name: PostNord Roadshow Jan 2013.1 - Roadshow Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Get on the Road with PostNord
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Roadshow January 2013 Don't Miss Out Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Maddam}},
We know that the winter is cold but come sign up for our roadshow coming <http://eu-lon02.marketo.com/lp/postenab/PostNordRoadshowJan2013_Registration.html>to {{my.Location:default=edit me}} <http://eu-lon02.marketo.com/lp/postenab/PostNordRoadshowJan2013_Registration.html> this {{my.Date:default=}}. Learn the last from the experts on how to get your packages delivered.
You will hear the expert talk about:
<http://eu-lon02.marketo.com/lp/postenab/PostNordRoadshowJan2013_Registration.html>
- The latest in Direct Mail - Logistics Services - Distribution Services
Bring a Friend with you - forward this invite <{{system.forwardToFriendLink:default=}}>today!
Learn more on what PostNord <http://www.postnord.com> has to offer today!
Hope to see you there.
The PostNord Team
